text: Li Zhiguang (born 1 June 1983) is a Chinese cross-country skier. He competed in the men's 30 kilometre pursuit event at the 2006 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese male cross-country skiers Category:Olympic cross-country skiers of China Category:Cross-country skiers at the 2006 Winter Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Li Zhiguang
